message: I am interested in creating a basic EEG device similar to those seen in the OpenEEG project however my knowledge of electronics is limited so I am looking for an individual to provide assistance. I am local to NYC and willing to pay someone for a few hours of their time.

I haven't had the time or money but have been wanting to explore OpenEEG for a couple years.....I was going to partner with a sculptor to develop a device but that did not pan out.  I can't help but I'm interested if some1 steps up whose interested in helping you.
